授業目的: Research Seminar will improve students' abilities to conduct research and analyses on themes of their own choices.
到達目標: Through group and individual guidance and consultation with the faculty, the students will carry out research/analyses on their interested research theme. The first part of Research Seminar (Spring) will broadly cover selected accounting and business issues from cases, newspaper and journal articles. The second part of Research Seminar (Fall) will continue on topics covered in Spring with more detailed analyses and discussions of each student's individual research theme. Students are expected to submit a research proposal in the middle of the Fall semester and continue to work on their theses in the following year.　2021年度から新たに日本語による指導も行います。授業時間内に一部、授業時間外に一部、日本語によるResearch Seminar1の補講を行う予定です。補講への参加を希望する学生の出席可能日時を学期開始後に集計し、可能時間帯に補講を（原則）毎週1時間程度は行う予定とします。
